name: inhospitably
content:
inhospitably adverb
(PLACE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that makes it unattractive or unsuitable for humans: The surface of the planet is inhospitably cold and dry. The weather here is inhospitably hot. They are putting on the play in an inhospitably big and ill-suited theatre.
More examplesFewer examplesWe looked out on an inhospitably barren landscape.The building is inhospitably draughty.You'll never get people to come to such an inhospitably cold and rainy place.
